document.heading: Pre-K Student Discipline Amendment Act of 2015

history.narrative: Law 21-12, the “Pre-K Student Discipline Amendment Act of 2015,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 21-1. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 17, 2015, and April 14, 2015, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 6, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 21-50 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 21-12 became effective June 23, 2015.
